settings.title: World's Best Keyboard
settings.content: Logitech MX Keys Master is a revolutionary new keyboad that makes typing easier and more comfortable on your fingers.

settings.title: The Logitech MX Keys Master is adesigned to make typing easier and more comfortable
settings.description: The Logitech MX Keys Master is an innovative keyboard designed to make typing easier and more comfortable for your fingers. Its carefully crafted keys are shaped for precision and comfort, allowing your fingers to glide effortlessly across the keyboard. The low-profile design and ergonomic layout reduce strain, making long typing sessions more comfortable. Whether you're working on a project or simply writing an email, the MX Keys Master enhances your typing experience with its thoughtful design and user-friendly features.

settings.title: Connect via the included Unifying USB Receiver or Bluetooth low energy technology
settings.description: You can connect the Logitech MX Keys keyboard using the included Unifying USB receiver or via Bluetooth Low Energy technology. The Unifying receiver provides a reliable connection for your desktop or laptop, while Bluetooth offers the flexibility to connect to a wide range of devices, including tablets and smartphones, without the need for a separate dongle. Both options ensure a stable and responsive connection, giving you the freedom to choose the best setup for your needs.

settings.title: Easy-switch keys to connect up to three devices and easily switch between them
settings.description: The Logitech MX Keys keyboard features easy-switch keys that allow you to connect to up to three devices simultaneously and switch between them with a single press. This functionality makes it simple to move from typing on your computer to your tablet or smartphone without any hassle. Whether you're working across multiple platforms or juggling personal and professional devices, the easy-switch keys streamline your workflow, ensuring a smooth transition between devices.

settings.title: USB-C to USB-C Charging
settings.description:
A USB-C to USB-C charging cable powers your MX Keys for Mac and connects directly to your Mac, eliminating the need for a bulky dongle.

On a full charge, MX Keys for Mac lasts up to 10 days, or up to 5 months with backlighting turned off. Battery life may vary based on user and computing conditions.

settings.title: On/Off power switch
settings.description: The MX Keys keyboards by Logitech are equipped with a convenient ON/OFF power switch, allowing you to conserve battery life when the keyboard is not in use. This simple switch ensures that your keyboard is only using power when needed, helping to extend the time between charges. Whether you're stepping away from your desk or packing up for travel, the ON/OFF switch offers an easy way to manage your keyboard's power efficiently.

settings.title: Ambient light sensors that adjust backlighting brightness
settings.description: Logitech MX Keys keyboards feature ambient light sensors that automatically adjust the backlighting brightness based on the lighting conditions in your environment. These sensors detect the surrounding light levels and adjust the keyboard's backlighting to ensure optimal visibility without wasting power. In dimly lit rooms, the backlighting intensifies for easier typing, while in brighter conditions, it dims or turns off to save energy. This smart functionality ensures a seamless and efficient typing experience, adapting to your needs without requiring manual adjustments.

settings.title: Easy-switch keys to connect up to three devices and easily switch between them
settings.description: The Logitech MX Keys keyboards come with easy-switch keys, allowing you to connect up to three devices simultaneously and effortlessly switch between them with the press of a button. Whether you're working on a computer, tablet, or smartphone, you can seamlessly transition between devices without the hassle of reconnecting or pairing each time. This feature enhances productivity and convenience, making it ideal for multitaskers who need to manage multiple devices at once.

settings.title: Hand proximity sensors that turn the backlighting on
settings.description: The Logitech MX Keys keyboards are equipped with hand proximity sensors that automatically turn on the backlighting when your hands approach the keyboard. This smart feature ensures that the keys are illuminated right when you need them, without any manual intervention. The backlighting remains off when not in use, conserving battery life, and instantly activates as soon as your hands get close, providing a seamless and responsive typing experience in any lighting condition.

settings.title: Dimentions
settings.description:
• Height: 5.18 in (131.63 mm)
  • Width: 16.94 in (430.2 mm)
  • Depth: 0.81 in (20.5 mm)
  • Weight: 28.57 oz (810 g)

settings.title: 10 meters wireless range
settings.description: The Logitech MX Keys keyboard offers a wireless range of up to 10 meters, giving you the flexibility to work comfortably from a distance. Whether you're presenting from across the room or simply prefer a clutter-free desk, this extended range ensures a strong and reliable connection, allowing you to stay productive without being tethered to your device.
